hero.title: Interactive Learning
hero.description: Artemis brings interactive learning to life with instant, individual feedback on programming exercises, quizzes, modeling tasks, and more. Offering customization for instructors and real-time collaboration for students, this platform bridges creativity and education. Embrace a new era of engaging, adaptive learning with Artemis, where innovation meets inclusivity.
hero.subtitle: Artemis is open-source. Meet the future of educational excellence.
hero.usedBy: Trusted by Premier Academic Institutions and Educators

features.title: Innovative Technology Meets Educational Research
features.subtitle: Artemis unites cutting-edge technology and latest research results to deliver an unparalleled interactive learning experience.

0.title: Customizable Programming Exercises
0.description: Experience a seamless integration of version control, automated feedback, and continuous assessment for a variety of programming languages.

1.title: Secure and Flexible Exams
1.description: Create online exams with exercise variants, integrated plagiarism checks, and structured grading criteria for a comprehensive evaluation.

2.title: Interactive Learning with AI
2.description: Leverage the power of the latest GPT/LLM models to enrich hints and feedback, making learning truly interactive.

3.title: Modeling and Text Exercises
3.description: Utilize a variety of modeling exercises based on UML diagrams and text exercises assessed through machine learning and NLP.

4.title: Comprehensive Lectures
4.description: Upload lecture slides, integrate video sessions, and design consecutive units with exercises for a complete learning experience.

5.title: Interactive Communication
5.description: Engage with students and faculty through Q&A forums, chats per lecture and exercise, and customizable notifications.

6.title: Multifaceted Assessment
6.description: From quizzes to modeling exercises, Artemis provides a diverse range of assessment types, supported by machine learning and NLP technologies.

7.title: Adaptive Learning Paths
7.description: Empower students to monitor their progress through customizable learning objectives and competency tracking.

8.title: Open-Source and Scalable
8.description: Join a community-driven project that scales to meet the needs of courses with thousands of students, all while staying free to use.

header.title: Programming Exercises: The Heart of Artemis
header.subtitle: Tailored Feedback and Continuous Assessment in Multiple Languages

programmingExercises.description: Artemis provides a comprehensive framework for programming exercises. It integrates with version control systems and offers automated feedback based on test cases and static code analysis. With support for multiple languages, Artemis is an ideal solution for a diverse range of courses.

integration.title: Seamless Integration with Your CI/CD Tools
integration.description: Artemis integrates effortlessly with popular CI/CD platforms to complement your existing workflow.
integration.platforms: Choose from a variety of supported platforms, including GitLab and Jenkins.
integration.standalone: Or just use Artemis as a standalone solution - it's up to you!

assessment.title: Automated Assessment
assessment.description: Students receive instant, automated, individual feedback through test results, static code analysis, and AI recommendations.
assessment.security0: Artemis securely executes student code in isolated Docker containers, ensuring that the system is protected from malicious code. For Java, we're leveraging our
assessment.security1: testing framework to further control the behavior of student code.
assessment.scale: Forget about manually grading hundreds of submissions - Artemis gives you the tools to automate the process. Scale your course to thousands of students without sacrificing quality.

programmingExercises.programmingLanguages: Works with all programming languages, such as

header.title: Exam Mode: Comprehensive Student Assessment
header.subtitle: Integrated Plagiarism Checks, Test Runs, and Student Reviews

examMode.description: Artemis' exam mode allows instructors to create unique exams for each student, complete with a variety of exercise types. Test runs ensure a smooth exam process, while built-in plagiarism checks maintain academic integrity. Grading is streamlined through the Assessment Dashboard, and students can easily review and appeal their scores.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: You can evaluate the exam outcome using the statistics generated by Artemis.
statistics.usingMetrics: Review the students' performance using various metrics such as average, median, and standard deviation.
statistics.studentFeedback: Review the students' perceived difficulty of every exercise to improve exams in the future.

automaticAssessment.title: Machine-learning Assisted Assessment
automaticAssessment.description: Artemis supports correction with automatic and semi-automatic assessments for various exercise types.
automaticAssessment.automate: For quiz exercises, you may specify the correct solution in advance. After conducting an exam, you can prompt Artemis to automatically evaluate all submissions.
automaticAssessment.quality: For text and modeling exercises, you can activate automatic correction suggestions. Artemis uses machine learning to identify similar elements across submissions.

cta.title: Empower Your Courses
cta.subtitle: Transform your teaching and enrich student experience with Artemis today.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: Artemis is developed by a team of passionate students and researchers at the Technical University of Munich.
